==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|け|はい|yomi=o}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=けはい|けわい}}, previously spelled as {{m|ja|けはひ}} and probably originally realized as {{IPAchar|/kepapi/}}.  This derived as a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|気|tr1=ke|t1=atmosphere, spirit; feeling, mood|這い|alt2=這ひ|tr2=hahi</i>, modern <i>hai|t2=creeeping, crawling; spreading|pos2=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|這う}} ''hau'', “to crawl, to creep; to spread along the ground, to spread around”}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="Daijisen">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>

The {{m|ja|配|tr=hai||distribution}} kanji was applied to the ''hai'' portion of the reading as an example of {{jukujikun|sort=けはい}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|けはい|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR,NHK|acc2=1|acc2_ref=DJR,NHK}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|き|はい}}

Possibly a shift from ''kehai'' above, using the [[漢音#Japanese|kan'on]] reading of ''ki'' for {{m|ja|気}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|きはい|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR|acc2=0|acc2_ref=DJR|acc3=1|acc3_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|きはい|kyu=氣配}}

# {{l|en|thoughtfulness}}, {{l|en|consideration}}
# the {{l|en|appearance}}, {{l|en|state}}, or {{l|en|condition}} of something
# {{l|en|mood}}, {{l|en|feeling}}, {{l|en|emotion}}
# the {{l|en|state}}, {{l|en|feeling}}, or {{l|en|sentiment}} of a {{l|en|market}}

=====Synonyms=====
{{sense|thoughtfulness, consideration}}
* {{ja-r|配%慮|はい%りょ}}, {{ja-r|心%遣い|こころ%づかい}}, {{ja-r|心%使い|こころ%づかい}}
{{sense|appearance, state}}
* {{ja-r|有%様|あり%さま}}, {{ja-r|様%子|よう%す}}, {{ja-r|景%気|けい%き}}
{{sense|mood, feeling}}
* {{ja-r|気%分|き%ぶん}}, {{ja-r|気%持|き%もち}}
{{sense|market sentiment}}
* {{ja-r|景%気|けい%き}}, {{ja-r|市%況|し%きょう}}

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=j|き|くば|o2=り}}

Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=きくばり|気|tr1=ki|t1=atmosphere, spirit; feeling, mood|配り|tr2=kubari|t2=distributing; spreading, as one's attention or care|pos2=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|配る}} ''kubaru'', “to distribute; to spread, as one's attention or care”}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|きくばり|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{m|ja|気配り}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|きくばり|kyu=氣配}}

# {{l|en|thoughtfulness}}, {{l|en|consideration}}

=====Synonyms=====
* {{ja-r|配%慮|はい%りょ}}
* {{ja-r|心%遣い|こころ%づかい}}, {{ja-r|心%使い|こころ%づかい}}
